name: Intraday Momentum Scalping Trend Strategy
description: Aggressive intraday momentum-scalping strategy that trades high-liquidity U.S. large-cap stocks on 1-minute data. Long entries occur on RSI(14) breakout above 70 confirmed by a 5-minute volume spike ≥30 % above its 20-period mean. Exits use a 0.6 % static target, 0.3 % trailing stop (from highest price), or a 3-minute time stop enforced by the trading engine. Each trade risks 2 % of portfolio equity via fixed-fraction sizing. Strategy is flat by session close and relies solely on price and volume inputs.
